  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/tmowningsimplecompiler">TMOwningSimpleCompiler</a></>}>
A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/simplecompiler">SimpleCompiler</a> that owns its <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine">TargetMachine</a>. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/tmowningsimplecompiler/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/concurrentircompiler">ConcurrentIRCompiler</a></>}>
A thread-safe version of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/simplecompiler">SimpleCompiler</a>. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/concurrentircompiler/#details">More...</a>
